snippet: Two off-duty firefighters are being credited with helping save the life of a 61-year-old man who suffered a heart attack at the New England Patriots-New York Jets game on Christmas Eve....
lead_paragraph: Two off-duty firefighters are being credited with helping save the life of a 61-year-old man who suffered a heart attack at the New England Patriots-New York Jets game on Christmas Eve.

headline.main: 2 Off-Duty Firefighters Help Save Man During Patriots Game
headline.print_headline: 2 Off-Duty Firefighters Help Save Man During Patriots Game
